text: Gonzalo Galván Castillo (10 January 1951 - 23 November 2020) was a Mexican Roman Catholic prelate. He was the Bishop of Autlán between 2004 to 2015. He was born in León, Guanajuato. Galván Castillo died on 23 November 2020 at the age of 69.Fallece Gonzalo Galván Castillo, obispo emérito de la Diócesis de Autlán ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Guanajuato (state)
title: Gonzalo Galván Castillo
